column1: 1. Guide Evaluation (20): Background knowledge (10) and Topic relevance (10)
2. Presentation (40): Organization (10) Clarity & Communication (10) Q&A (10) Overall Participation (10)
3. Report (20): Technical Content (8) Overall Quality (5) Templates Followed (4) Adequacy of References (3)
5. Minimum marks to pass: 50 out of 100
- Technical Content (8): Depth, accuracy, and relevance of technical information
- Overall Quality (5): Language, readability, professional appearance
- Templates Followed (4): Adherence to format, structure, and organization
- Adequacy of References (3): Quality, relevance, and proper citation of 2-3 recent papers
